title: Underground water
creator_credit: Roland Beckett, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Forum Australia
brief_description: The importance of underground water in Australia. Indicates the extent to which the cattle country relies on bore water and the work being done by geologists and hydrographers in the field, and the scientists in laboratories, on the problem of desalination.
creator_credit_for_label: Roland Beckett, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Forum Australia
